import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Covid =()=>{ const [data, setData] = useState([]); const getdata = async () =>{ try{ const res= await fetch('https://api.rootnet.in/covid19-in/stats/latest'); const adata = await res.json(); console.log(adata['data']['summary']); setData(adata['data']['summary']); }catch(err){ console.log(err); } } useEffect(() =>{ getdata(); },[]); return( <>
